rows.business_item_short_description: On-demand compute technology services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS provides on-demand compute services that enable developers and enterprises to run applications and workloads efficiently. These services support a wide range of computing needs from startups to large organizations.
rows.evidence_span: AWS serves developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions, by offering a broad set of on-demand technology services such as compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning.

rows.business_item_short_description: On-demand storage technology services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS offers scalable and secure storage services that cater to various data storage needs for developers and enterprises. These services support data management and backup solutions across different industries.
rows.evidence_span: AWS serves developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions, by offering a broad set of on-demand technology services such as compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning.

rows.business_item_short_description: On-demand database technology services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS provides database services that allow users to create, manage, and scale databases efficiently. These services support various database engines and are designed for high availability and security.
rows.evidence_span: AWS serves developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions, by offering a broad set of on-demand technology services such as compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning.

rows.business_item_short_description: On-demand analytics technology services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS offers analytics services that help organizations process and analyze large volumes of data to gain insights. These services support data visualization, reporting, and real-time analytics.
rows.evidence_span: AWS serves developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions, by offering a broad set of on-demand technology services such as compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning.

rows.business_item_short_description: On-demand machine learning technology services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS provides machine learning services that enable developers and enterprises to build, train, and deploy machine learning models at scale. These services support various AI applications and workflows.
rows.evidence_span: AWS serves developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions, by offering a broad set of on-demand technology services such as compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning.

rows.business_item_short_description: Advertising services offered by AWS to sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS offers sponsored ads as part of its advertising services, helping sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors promote their products and content. These ads are targeted to reach relevant audiences effectively.
rows.evidence_span: Additionally, AWS offers advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors through sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.

rows.business_item_short_description: Display advertising services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS provides display advertising services that allow sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors to showcase their products and content visually across various platforms. This service enhances brand visibility and engagement.
rows.evidence_span: Additionally, AWS offers advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors through sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.

rows.business_item_short_description: Video advertising services offered by AWS.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS offers video advertising services that enable sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors to promote their products and content through video formats. This service helps capture audience attention and drive conversions.
rows.evidence_span: Additionally, AWS offers advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, and authors through sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.

rows.business_item_short_description: AWS serves developers and enterprises with cloud services.
rows.business_item_long_description: AWS offers cloud computing services to developers and enterprises, supporting their technological and operational needs. It is part of the International segment's offerings to business customers.
rows.evidence_span: This segment also serves developers and enterprises through AWS and offers programs for content creators.

rows.business_item_short_description: Fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items.
rows.business_item_long_description: The North America segment offers fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items, ensuring quick delivery to customers. This service is a key benefit provided to customers in this region.
rows.evidence_span: The North America segment provides fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items

rows.business_item_short_description: Access to award-winning movies and series.
rows.business_item_long_description: Customers in the North America segment have access to award-winning movies and series, enhancing the entertainment options available through Amazon's services.
rows.evidence_span: access to award-winning movies and series

rows.business_item_long_description: The segment provides customers with access to live sports, adding to the variety of entertainment and content offerings available.

rows.business_item_short_description: Fulfillment of customer orders through North America fulfillment networks.
rows.business_item_long_description: Customer orders in the North America segment are fulfilled through Amazon-operated North America fulfillment networks, ensuring efficient processing and delivery.
rows.evidence_span: Customer orders are fulfilled through North America fulfillment networks operated by Amazon

rows.business_item_short_description: Delivery of products through digital means.
rows.business_item_long_description: The segment includes digital delivery as a method to fulfill customer orders, complementing physical shipping and store options.
